<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth">AArch64PAuth</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Variants of check performed on an authenticated pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In cases such as authenticating the LR value when performing a tail call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// or when re-signing a signed pointer with a different signing schema,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a failed authentication may not generate an exception on its own and may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// create an authentication or signing oracle if not checked explicitly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A number of check methods modify control flow in a similar way by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// rewriting the code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;authenticate LR&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;more instructions&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;authenticate LR&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;method-specific checker&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// on&#95;fail:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   brk &lt;code&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// on&#95;success:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;more instructions&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10">AuthCheckMethod</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Do not check the value at all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">None</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Perform a load to a temporary register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a24204a7fa8ab4d609a76a48ac4673b22"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a24204a7fa8ab4d609a76a48ac4673b22">DummyLoad</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check by comparing bits 62 and 61 of the authenticated address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method modifies control flow and inserts the following checker:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   eor Xtmp, Xn, Xn, lsl #1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   tbz Xtmp, #62, on&#95;success</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a47343d56dc562d3a8366d3854eb64161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a47343d56dc562d3a8366d3854eb64161">HighBitsNoTBI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check by comparing the authenticated value with an XPAC-ed one without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using PAuth instructions not encoded as HINT. Can only be applied to LR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method modifies control flow and inserts the following checker:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   mov Xtmp, LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   xpaclri           ; encoded as &quot;hint #7&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ; Note: at this point, the LR register contains the address as if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ; the authentication succeeded and the temporary register contains the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ; &#42;real&#42; result of authentication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   cmp Xtmp, LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   b.eq on&#95;success</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a1fb8b484947fc2d97a18d9b90e0c08fb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a1fb8b484947fc2d97a18d9b90e0c08fb">XPACHint</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Similar to XPACHint but using Armv8.3-only XPAC instruction, thus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not restricted to LR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   mov Xtmp, Xn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   xpac(i|d) Xn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   cmp Xtmp, Xn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   b.eq on&#95;success</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10ae34527c9d45ac8d5e68634911bfcd36e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10ae34527c9d45ac8d5e68634911bfcd36e">XPAC</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="#a1916a718bc5fe45363e746d758e502f7"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define AUTH&#95;CHECK&#95;METHOD&#95;CL&#95;VALUES&#95;COMMON                                     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  clEnumValN(AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::None, &quot;none&quot;,                      \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">             &quot;Do not check authenticated address&quot;),                            \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      clEnumValN(AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::DummyLoad, &quot;load&quot;,             \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">                 &quot;Perform dummy load from authenticated address&quot;),             \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      clEnumValN(                                                              \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">          AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::HighBitsNoTBI, &quot;high-bits-notbi&quot;,     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">          &quot;Compare bits 62 and 61 of address (TBI should be disabled)&quot;),       \\</span></CodeLine>
